name: Joplin Audio Transcriber
description: Transcribes attached audio files using the OpenAI or Google Gemini APIs and creates a transcription note with the press of a button.
author: Jordan Voets

screenshots.label: Audio file selected in a Joplin note with the option to transcribe using the plugin
Transcribing audio file and creating a new note with the transcription results.
Transcription results displayed in a new Joplin note, showing the transcribed text and metadata.
Plugin settings page where users can configure their OpenAI or Google Gemini API keys and transcription options.

promo_tile.label: Joplin Audio Transcriber - Transcribe attached audio files to text with AI
